amendment.description: Amendment requires FEMA to disclose all disaster relief grants, not just those over $1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part C of House Report 113-1 to require FEMA to disclose all disaster relief grants, not just those over $1 million.

action.text: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Huelskamp to the Frelinghuysen amendment (A003).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huelskamp amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
